Mtendere Mandowa, ónyé a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu  bụ Teebs, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye na-ese ihe nkiri si Los Angeles, California. Ọ bụ ónyé otu My Hollow Drum. Ọ bụkwa otu ọkara nke duo Sons of the Morning.
A mụrụ ya na Bronx, nné na nnà si Malawi na Barbados zụlitere Mandowa.

Teebs wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, Ardour, na Brainfeeder na 2010. LA Weekly kpọrọ ya "otu n'ime abọm kachasị mma na nke kachasị mmá n'afọ". Ọ sochiri album nchịkọta, Collections 01, wepụtara na Brainfeeder na 2011.

N'afọ 2013, Sons of the Morning, ọrụ ya na Prefuse irí asaá na atọ, wepụtara EP mbụ, Speak Soon Volume One, na Yellow Year Records. N'afọ 2014, Teebs wepụtara abọm studio nké abụọ ya, Estara, na Brainfeeder
A na-akpọ ụdị Teebs "egwú na-akụ", ụdị nké na-agụnye ndekọ, ịhazi, ịgbanwe na ịhazi ọtụtụ ụda gụnyere ụbọ akwara, ndị na-eme mkpọtụ, ịgbà na ọbụna ịkpụ teepu.
